pages.text: If $(l:signs_abilities/selection_wheel)selected$(), the Witcher can press $(6)$(l)[$(k:origins.ternary_active)]$() $(l)(Origins: Ternary Active)$() to cast Igni - a pyrokinetic burst that ignites opponents and $(l:signs_abilities/igni#page_igni_blockstates)alters some blockstates$() in a medium radius around the Witcher. Igni has a cooldown of 10s after casting.

pages.title: Cooldown Bar
pages.text: $(l)TIP$(): Use Igni to burn large groups of enemies, or to escape powder snow or cobweb traps!

pages.title: Igni - Blockstates
pages.text: Igni will affect certain blocks when they are caught in the radius of the sign:$(li)Powdered Snow will melt into water.$(li)All Ice variants will melt into water.$(li)Cobwebs and Sweet Berry Bushes will burn away.$(li)Unlit Campfires, Candles and Candle Cakes will light if you look at them while casting.$(li)Grass, Vines and Ferns will burn away.
